name: How to Find Lead Users Online (Fast) - Worksheets
description:
The Digital Lead User Analysis is a method to find future customer needs. By analyzing user-generated content, it is possible to infer needs that have not yet been solved by the market.




In our master thesis, we have taken the approach of Eric von Hippel and Sandro Kaulartz and put it into an economic context with the help of methods from strategic design.


The whole process is explained through the worksheets.




Visit our Website for further information here!
